tit.e: Tako to Ama (The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife)
tit.cmt: ※「蛸と海女」の訳は用語集から採用しています（＝Wikipediaでの英訳）。
tit.e: Tako to Ama (The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife)
Tako to Ama (The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife)

sen.j: 『蛸と海女』は葛飾北斎による1820年頃の艶本『喜能会之故真通』（きのえのこまつ）の中の木版画の一枚。
sen.e: "Tako to Ama" is a woodblock print by Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, which was included in the enpon (pornography) "Kinoe no Komatsu" published around 1820.
sen.cmt: ※「艶本」の訳は用語集から採用しています。
sen.e: "Tako to Ama" is a woodblock print by Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, which was included in the enpon (pornography) "Kinoe no Komatsu" published around 1820.
"Tako to Ama" is a woodblock print by Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, which was included in the enpon (pornography) "Kinoe no Komatsu" published around 1820.

sen.j: この絵では一人の女性が2匹のタコから性的快楽を受けている。
sen.e: It depicts a woman enjoying sexual pleasure with two octopuses.
sen.cmt: The small octopus is kissing her on the lips while the big octopus is giving her a blow job.
sen.e: It depicts a woman enjoying sexual pleasure with two octopuses.
It depicts a woman enjoying sexual pleasure with two octopuses.

sen.j: 小蛸の方からは口吸い（接吻）を受け、大蛸は彼女にクンニリングスしている。
sen.e: The small octopus is kissing her on the lips while the big octopus is giving her a blow job.
The small octopus is kissing her on the lips while the big octopus is giving her cunnilingus.
The small octopus is kissing her on the lips while the big octopus is giving her cunnilingus.

sen.j: アニミズムと性への戯れが北斎により融合された作品である。
sen.e: Hokusai integrates animism and sexual dalliance in this work.

sen.j: 新藤兼人は緒形拳、田中裕子主演で1981年の映画『北斎漫画 (映画)』を監督し北斎の一生を描いた。
sen.e: Kaneto SHINDO directed the 1981 movie "Hokusai Manga," starring Ken OGATA and Yuko TANAKA, which depicted Hokusai's life.
Kaneto SHINDO directed the 1981 movie "Hokusai Manga," starring Ken OGATA and Yuko TANAKA, which depicted Hokusai's life.

sen.j: デイヴィット・レイティは同じ英題（The Dream of the Fishermans Wife）で絵を模倣した。
sen.e: David LAITY imitated the picture in the same English title, The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife.

sen.j: 彼は実際の絵の題名は “Dancing With Katsushika Hokusai “だったと主張している。
sen.e: He has insisted on its actual title being "Dancing With Katsushika Hokusai."
He has insisted on its actual title being "Dancing With Katsushika Hokusai."
He has insisted on its actual title being "Dancing With Katsushika Hokusai."

sen.j: 寺岡政美は彼の2001年の画集“Waves and Plaguest“の一枚に蛸と海女を描いた。
sen.e: Masami TERAOKA included a picture called "Sarah and Octopus/Seventh Heaven" depicting the woman and the octopuses in his 2001 collection, "Waves and Plaguest."
sen.cmt: ※原文に「"Sarah and Octopus/Seventh Heaven"」が抜けていると解釈しました。
sen.e: Masami TERAOKA included a picture called "Sarah and Octopus/Seventh Heaven" depicting the woman and the octopuses in his 2001 collection, "Waves and Plaguest."

sen.j: 空飛ぶスパゲッティ・モンスター教をフィーチャーしたが芸術家により作られた。
sen.e: A parody image featuring Flying Spaghetti Monsterism was made by Niklas Jansson, an artist.

sen.j: 漫画雑誌にはジョン・パウンドにより描かれた火星人の襲来に対するパロディーの絵がある。
sen.e: A parody picture depicting the invasion of Martians, painted by John Pound, was also included in the comic magazine "Commies from Mars: The Red Planet."
sen.cmt: ※原文に「" Commies from Mars: The Red Planet"」が抜けていると解釈しました。
sen.e: A parody picture depicting the invasion of Martians, painted by John Pound, was also included in the comic magazine "Commies from Mars: The Red Planet."

sen.j: 映画には性的な表現があり、アメリカ合衆国で最初の17歳未満お断りのレーティングとなった。
sen.e: Because of its sexually explicit content, it became the first NC-17-rated movie.
Because of its sexually explicit content, it became the first NC-17-rated movie in the United States.
Because of its sexually explicit content, it became the first NC-17-rated movie in the United States.

sen.j: 会田誠の「巨大フジ隊員vsキングギドラ」“The Giant Member Fuji Versus King Gidora“と、｢地球防衛少女イコちゃんvsキングギドラ」“The member of the giant Ico Chan vs. King Gidora“。
sen.e: Makoto AIDA's works "The Giant Member Fuji Versus King Gidora" and "The member of the giant Ico Chan vs. King Gidora" are also among examples.

sen.j: 17世紀より、類似したテーマの海洋生物と女性が性行為に及ぶ題材で、多くの根付が彫られている。
sen.e: A great number of netsuke (miniature carving attached to the end of a cord hanging from a pouch) have been made on a similar subject in which women and sea creatures are engaged in sexual intercourse since the 17th century.

A great number of netsuke (miniature carving attached to the end of a cord hanging from a pouch) have been made on a similar subject in which women and sea creatures are engaged in sexual intercourse since the 17th century.

sen.j: また現代においても、触手責めという呼称でポルノファンに好まれるアニメや漫画でのシチュエーションのひとつとして認識されている。
sen.e: Called tentacle rape, it is recognized today as a scene in cartoons and comics that is popular among pornography fans.
